attributes.description: The version number of this offer. When an existing offer is updated, a new one is typically created with an incremented version.
The ID of the associated application.
Date when this offer was created.
Date when this offer was resolved (e.g., when it was accepted, rejected).
Date when this offer was sent to the candidate.
Date when the candidate starts. This is the date entered in the Start Date field on the candidate's Offer Details.
One of: unresolved, accepted, rejected, deprecated.
Contains a hash of the custom fields configured for this resource.
Contains the same information as custom_fields but includes more detailed data with an immutable key.
The Job Opening associated with the offer. Null if none.
